string.value: I hear that Kyrin is looking for me, now that I've become a Captain. She apparently wants to teach me some new skills...
I must show Kyrin my skills to prove what I'm capable of. I'd better make sure I'm ready to show her everything I've got and stand up to her for at least 2 minutes.
I've finally gained Kyrin's confidence. Kyrin taught me the Battleship Skill in return.
오랜만이군. 못 본 사이에 많이 변했는걸? 애송이였을 때 해적이 되고 싶다며 찾아온 일이 엊그제 같은데 벌써 건슬링거가 되다니. 어때? 건슬링거가 된 기분이?
아직 무엇인가 부족하다고 생각되지 않나? 이미 충분히 강하다고 생각한다면 오산이야. 수련의 길은 끝이 없어. 네가 지금까지 걸어온 길보다 더 길고 험난한 수련의 길을 걸어야 더 강해질 수 있다고. 흐음... 눈빛을 보아하니 역시 무엇인가 부족하다고 느끼고 있군.
좋아. 바로 그 자세지. 새로운 스킬을 가르쳐주도록 하지. 단, 조건이 있지. 네가 건슬링거가 되었어도 내가 원하는 수준의 건슬링거가 아닐지도 몰라. 너의 강함을 보여줘. 내가 내는 시험을 통과하게 되면 새로운 스킬을 가르쳐주겠어.
나의 시험은 나를 버티는 거지. 나와 대결을 하는 거야. 난 너에게 가르쳐 줄 새 스킬을 사용할거야. 이 공격을 버텨보도록 해. 봐주지 않을 테니 단단히 준비해서 오는게 좋을거야. 자, 그럼 나에게 도전할 준비가 되면 다시 말을 걸어줘.
아직 자신이 없는 건가? 그런 배짱으로 건슬링거가 되었다니... 실망이군.

It's been a while. You've changed quite a bit since the last time I saw you. I still remember when you first came here wanting to become a Pirate, and now you're a Corsair. How does it feel to become one?

Don't you feel like you are lacking that something? If you feel that you are already plenty strong, then you are deathly wrong. The path to greatness is filled with treacherous obstacles, one that you'll have to continuously walk on. Hmmm... from looking at you, I can sense that you need that extra something.

That's the attitude I've been looking for. I'll teach you a new skill that'll blow you away. Under one condition, that is... You may be a Corsair, but you may not have reached the level that I want you to be in. If you pass the test I give you, then and only then will I give you the new skill.

My test basically involves... withstanding me. You'll be dueling me in a battle, and I'll be using the new skill that I'll teach you. If you can withstand the attack, then you'll be good. I won't go easy on you, so you may want to really prepare yourself for this test. Now, let me know when you're ready to take on the challenge.
Are you afraid to take the test? And you're telling me you're a Corsair? How disappointing...
Congratulations. You have managed to pass my test. I'll teach you a new skill called 'Battleship'.

Unlike most of the other skills you used as a Pirate, this one definitely is different. You can actually ride the 'Battleship' and attack enemies with it. Your DEF level will increase for the time you're on board, so that'll help you tremendously in combat situations. May you become the best Gunslinger out there...
